job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are a marketplace where users can compare personalized, prequalified rates and quotes from multiple lenders and carriers, for student loans, mortgages, personal loans, and insurance.
       We're challenging the status quo by giving power to the consumer. We believe in a world where 'ethical', 'lending', and 'insurance' can coexist, so we set out to build innovative platforms that actually work for customers. Our mission is to help people find the best loan or insurance policy possible.
       We believe researching and buying loans or insurance shouldn't be confusing or complex, so we've focused on simplicity. We've created the only unbiased loan and insurance buying process out there, which makes finding options straightforward and clear.
       We are looking for a talented and passionate Software Engineer to join our central AI-focused software engineering team. This is a unique opportunity to be part of the team that will shape the future of our AI capabilities and transform the way we serve our users. We are looking for a creative and curious individual with a strong passion for AI, and a track record of working on innovative projects.
       show more
       Responsibilities

     * Thrive on collaboration; work closely with Product, Design and other teams to define requirements, provide technical insights, and deliver AI-driven features.
     * Design, develop and deploy full-stack solutions that seamlessly integrate AI capabilities into web-based applications.
     * Conduct thorough testing, including unit testing and integration testing, to ensure the quality, performance, and reliability of AI features.
     * Optimize implementations for performance and scalability
     * Stay up to date with the latest advancements in AI technologies and contribute ideas for the continuous improvement of AI driven features.
job_details.full_text:
Middle+ / Senior Software Engineer - AI

We are a marketplace where users can compare personalized, prequalified rates and quotes from multiple lenders and carriers, for student loans, mortgages, personal loans, and insurance.
       We're challenging the status quo by giving power to the consumer. We believe in a world where 'ethical', 'lending', and 'insurance' can coexist, so we set out to build innovative platforms that actually work for customers. Our mission is to help people find the best loan or insurance policy possible.
       We believe researching and buying loans or insurance shouldn't be confusing or complex, so we've focused on simplicity. We've created the only unbiased loan and insurance buying process out there, which makes finding options straightforward and clear.
       We are looking for a talented and passionate Software Engineer to join our central AI-focused software engineering team. This is a unique opportunity to be part of the team that will shape the future of our AI capabilities and transform the way we serve our users. We are looking for a creative and curious individual with a strong passion for AI, and a track record of working on innovative projects.
       show more
       Responsibilities

     * Thrive on collaboration; work closely with Product, Design and other teams to define requirements, provide technical insights, and deliver AI-driven features.
     * Design, develop and deploy full-stack solutions that seamlessly integrate AI capabilities into web-based applications.
     * Conduct thorough testing, including unit testing and integration testing, to ensure the quality, performance, and reliability of AI features.
     * Optimize implementations for performance and scalability
     * Stay up to date with the latest advancements in AI technologies and contribute ideas for the continuous improvement of AI driven features.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes designing, developing, and deploying full-stack solutions that integrate AI capabilities into web-based applications, with a focus on AI-driven features. This aligns with the GenAI Engineer profile's core responsibilities of building and maintaining production-grade user-facing software systems powered by AI. While it mentions testing and optimization, the primary focus is on the application of AI to create user-facing features rather than the core predictive modeling or data engineering aspects of an ML Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions understanding the business context of a marketplace for financial products and aligning AI capabilities with user needs and company mission.
job_tasks.phrase: We are a marketplace where users can compare personalized, prequalified rates and quotes from multiple lenders and carriers, for student loans, mortgages, personal loans, and insurance. We're challenging the status quo by giving power to the consumer. We believe in a world where 'ethical', 'lending', and 'insurance' can coexist, so we set out to build innovative platforms that actually work for customers. Our mission is to help people find the best loan or insurance policy possible.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves designing, developing, and deploying full-stack solutions and integrating AI capabilities into web-based applications, which are core software development activities.
job_tasks.phrase: Design, develop and deploy full-stack solutions that seamlessly integrate AI capabilities into web-based applications.

job_tasks.justification: Conducting thorough testing, including unit and integration testing, is a standard software development practice to ensure the quality of developed features.
job_tasks.phrase: Conduct thorough testing, including unit testing and integration testing, to ensure the quality, performance, and reliability of AI features.

job_tasks.justification: Optimizing implementations for performance and scalability is a key aspect of building robust software applications.
job_tasks.phrase: Optimize implementations for performance and scalability

job_tasks.justification: The role requires contributing to the continuous improvement of AI-driven features and staying updated with AI advancements, implying involvement in the application or adaptation of AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: Stay up to date with the latest advancements in AI technologies and contribute ideas for the continuous improvement of AI driven features.

job_tasks.justification: The job requires working closely with Product and Design teams to define requirements and provide technical insights for AI-driven features, demonstrating an understanding of business needs.
job_tasks.phrase: work closely with Product, Design and other teams to define requirements, provide technical insights, and deliver AI-driven features.

job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly states 'Thrive on collaboration' and working closely with other teams.
The requirement to 'Stay up to date with the latest advancements in AI technologies' indicates a need for continuous learning and adaptability.
job_tasks.phrase: Stay up to date with the latest advancements in AI technologies

job_tasks.justification: The job seeks a 'creative and curious individual with a strong passion for AI, and a track record of working on innovative projects,' suggesting a need for innovation and initiative.
job_tasks.phrase: creative and curious individual with a strong passion for AI, and a track record of working on innovative projects.

soft_skills.phrase: work closely with Product, Design and other teams to define requirements, provide technical insights, and deliver AI-driven features.
Stay up to date with the latest advancements in AI technologies
